    Getting started

    getting-started.Rmd
    library(procedural)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)

    The ICD-10-PCS, or International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Procedure Coding System, is a procedure classification system developed by 3M Health Information Systems and adopted under HIPAA for classifying procedures performed in hospital inpatient health care settings.


    Coding Conventions

    PCS codes are composed of seven alphanumeric characters. Each character contains up to 34 possible values. The seven characters that make up a complete code have specific meanings that vary for each of the 17 sections of the manual.

    Each value represents a specific option for the general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) and 24 letters (A-H, J-N, and P-Z) may be used in each character.

    The letters O and I are not used so as to avoid confusion with the digits 0 and 1.

    Axes

    Each character is an axis of classification that specifies information about the procedure performed.

    Within a defined code range, a character specifies the same type of information in that axis of classification.

    For example, The fifth axis of classification specifies the Approach in sections 0 through 4 and 7 through 9 of the system.

    Axis Name
    1 Section
    2 Body System
    3 Root Operation
    4 Body Part
    5 Approach
    6 Device
    7 Qualifier 
    pcs("0016070")
    #> # A tibble: 7 × 5
#>   axis  name        code  label                                     table  
#>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                     <glue> 
#> 1 1     Section     0     Medical and Surgical                      0      
#> 2 2     Body System 0     Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves 00     
#> 3 3     Operation   1     Bypass                                    001    
#> 4 4     Body Part   6     Cerebral Ventricle                        0016   
#> 5 5     Approach    0     Open                                      00160  
#> 6 6     Device      7     Autologous Tissue Substitute              001607 
#> 7 7     Qualifier   0     Nasopharynx                               0016070

    Sections

    ICD-10-PCS Sections
    code label
    1 0 Medical and Surgical
    2 1 Obstetrics
    3 2 Placement
    4 3 Administration
    5 4 Measurement and Monitoring
    6 5 Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance
    7 6 Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies
    8 7 Osteopathic
    9 8 Other Procedures
    10 9 Chiropractic
    11 B Imaging
    12 C Nuclear Medicine
    13 D Radiation Therapy
    14 F Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology
    15 G Mental Health
    16 H Substance Abuse Treatment
    17 X New Technology

    Systems 

    systems() |> 
  select(sys.axis = name,
         sys.code = code, 
         sys.label = label) |>
  rowwise() |> 
  mutate(code = splitter(sys.code)[1]) |> 
  ungroup() |>
  left_join(sections(), by = join_by(code)) |> 
  select(axis = name, 
         code, 
         label, 
         sys.axis, 
         sys.code, 
         sys.label) |> 
  select(section = label, 
         code = sys.code, 
         system = sys.label) |> 
  gt(groupname_col = "section", 
     rowname_col = "system") |>
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> 
  cols_align(align = "center", columns = code) |>
  cols_label(code = "") |> 
  tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", 
                                   alpha = 0.5), 
                         cell_text(weight = "bold")), 
            locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> 
  opt_all_caps(locations = c("row_group")) |> 
  opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |>
  tab_header(title = html("<b>ICD-10-PCS</b> 2024")) |> 
  tab_options(
    column_labels.hidden = TRUE,
    heading.title.font.size = px(22),
    table.font.size = px(14),
    column_labels.border.bottom.width = px(0),
    column_labels.border.top.width = px(0),
    row_group.font.size = px(16),
    )

    Definitions 

    definitions() |> 
  summarise(n = n(), 
            .by = c(code, section, axis, axis_name)) |> 
  arrange(axis)
    #> # A tibble: 29 × 5
#>    code  section                                           axis  axis_name     n
#>    <chr> <chr>                                             <chr> <chr>     <int>
#>  1 0     Medical and Surgical                              3     Operation    31
#>  2 1     Obstetrics                                        3     Operation    12
#>  3 2     Placement                                         3     Operation     7
#>  4 3     Administration                                    3     Operation     3
#>  5 4     Measurement and Monitoring                        3     Operation     2
#>  6 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Perfor… 3     Operation     3
#>  7 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies              3     Operation    11
#>  8 7     Osteopathic                                       3     Operation     1
#>  9 8     Other Procedures                                  3     Operation     1
#> 10 9     Chiropractic                                      3     Operation     1
#> # ℹ 19 more rows
    definitions(section = "F") |> 
  filter(axis == "5") |> 
  select(label) |> 
  mutate(axis_code = row_number(), .before = 1)
    #> # A tibble: 132 × 2
#>    axis_code label                                          
#>        <int> <chr>

    Medical and Surgical 

    pcs("0016070") |> 
  gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> 
  cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, code)) |>
  tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", 
                                   alpha = 0.5), 
                         cell_text(weight = "bold")), 
            locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> 
  opt_all_caps() |> 
  tab_header(title = html("<b>ICD-10-PCS</b> 2024<hr>"),
             subtitle = html("<small>SECTION:</small> <b>0</b> Medical and Surgical<br>
                              <small>SYSTEM:</small> <b>0</b> Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves<br>
                              <small>OPERATION:</small> <b>1</b> Bypass<br><br>")) |> 
  tab_options(
    heading.title.font.size = px(24),
    heading.subtitle.font.size = px(18),
    heading.align = "left",
    table.font.color = "#0B0B45"
  )
    ICD-10-PCS 2024
    SECTION: 0 Medical and Surgical
    SYSTEM: 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
    OPERATION: 1 Bypass
    name code label table
    1 Section 0 Medical and Surgical 0
    2 Body System 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves 00
    3 Operation 1 Bypass 001
    4 Body Part 6 Cerebral Ventricle 0016
    5 Approach 0 Open 00160
    6 Device 7 Autologous Tissue Substitute 001607
    7 Qualifier 0 Nasopharynx 0016070 
    definitions() |> 
  dplyr::filter(code == '0', 
                axis == '3', 
                axis_code == '1') |> 
  dplyr::select(definition, explanation, includes) |> 
  unlist()
    #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                              definition 
#>                                                                                                                                                                  "Altering the route of passage of the contents of a tubular body part" 
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                             explanation 
#> "Rerouting contents of a body part to a downstream area of the normal route, to a similar route and body part, or to an abnormal route and dissimilar body part. Includes one or more anastomoses, with or without the use of a device" 
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                includes 
#>                                                                                                                                                                                           "Coronary artery bypass, colostomy formation"
    definitions() |> 
  dplyr::filter(code == '0', 
                axis == '5',
                label == 'Open') |> 
  dplyr::pull(definition)
    #> [1] "Cutting through the skin or mucous membrane and any other body layers necessary to expose the site of the procedure"
    definitions() |> 
  dplyr::filter(code == '0', 
                axis == '6',
                label == 'Autologous Tissue Substitute') |> 
  dplyr::pull(includes)
    #> [1] "Autograft"                             
#> [2] "Cultured epidermal cell autograft"     
#> [3] "Epicel(R) cultured epidermal autograft"
